HomePage.title: Hello, I'm
HomePage.name: Andrew
HomePage.subtitle: Frontend developer
HomePage.description: I build fast and clean web apps with React & Next.js.

AboutMe.title: About me
AboutMe.text1-part1: I'm a 20 year old frontend developer from
AboutMe.text1-part2: with experience in React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS. I build fast, responsive, and clean web applications.
AboutMe.text2: I started learning frontend in 2022 and since then I’ve worked on personal projects, small client websites, and interactive applications.
AboutMe.text3: I participated in a web development competition where our team built a booking system for teachers. We used PHP, HTML5, and CSS3, coding all the logic manually without frameworks. We advanced through the first round.
AboutMe.text4: The following year, I joined a different team and developed a Tic Tac Toe platform using Python Django, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and API integration. Again, we made it through the first round. These experiences led me to focus on modern technologies such as React and Next.js. Currently, I’m working on several projects with my colleague

Timeline.text1: I started with HTML & CSS, later JavaScript.
Timeline.text2: Tour de App competition: Handcoded reservation system in PHP.
Timeline.text3: Tour de App competition: Tic Tac Toe with Django, TS and Tailwind.
Timeline.text4: I started focusing on React & Next.js.
Timeline.text5: Collaboration with Galfar on some projects.

Projects.title: Featured projects
Projects.text: Have a look on some projects I've worked on so far.

project1.title: Multi-use hours scheduler for my school
project1.description: A multi-use hours scheduler for my school, allowing students to see what classes they have today, how many hours and which teacher is teaching them. Also include bus departures and announcements.

project2.title: Tic tac toe platform
project2.description: Tic tac toe platform for web developing contest Tour de App, where I learnt a lot about web development.

project4.title: A school website - MěSOŠ Klobouky u Brna
project4.description: Created using template blocks in WordPress

project5.title: A website for my first client
project5.description: The client specializes in the installation and service of shading equipment

project6.title: A website for UrvTek
project6.description: This website is a platform for upcoming music competition made by UrvTek. Collaborating with Galfar.

project7.title: A website for Rook Rules
project7.description: This website is a PokeDex of games Rook has played on stream so far. It features simple info about the game and brief description of the game. Also includes admin dashboard for actually importing these cards to display them in Game Dex. Collaborating with Galfar.

project8.title: Flock™ web application
project8.description: This web application is a platform for messaging with friends. It is still in the beginning of its development. Collaborating with Galfar.

TechStack.title: Tech stack
TechStack.text: Here is my overview of tech stack I've used so far.

name.tooShort: Name must be at least 2 characters

message.tooShort: Message must be at least 10 characters
